Mayor & City Council

Meetings

The mayor and council meet every second Thursday of each Month at City Hall.


Agendas & Minutes

Most Recent Agenda | View All Agendas and Minutes

        

Overview

The City of Selma is governed by the mayor and five-member City Council under the general law type A format. The Elected Officials that represent the citizens of Selma are:

Tom Daly

Mayor 

Term Expires May 2026

210-687-6757

mayor@ci.selma.tx.us

Noah Washington Jr.

Mayor Pro-Tem


Term Expires May 2026

210-204-1736

Becky Harris

Councilmember Place Three

Term Expires May 2026

210-260-5040

Kevin Hadas

Councilmember Place Four

Term Expires May 2027

210-383-3093

Jim Parma

Councilmember Place Five

Term Expires May 2027

210-413-5248


Ken Polasek

Councilmember Place Six

Term Expires May 2027

361-537-8810
